Australian Account Executive

Account executives are the key component in building and maintaining outstanding customer and client relationships. At 4Twenty we pride ourselves on being able to connect the leading account executive talent with their preferred choice of top-tier employers across the country. Because our consultants have worked in the field ourselves, we know that you need someone with exceptional communication, organisational and multitasking capabilities. In fact, before we present you with a tailored selection of switched on account executive candidates for your vacant role, each of these candidates undergoes an in-depth pre-screening process via phone and face-to-face meeting with our consultants, to ensure they have what it takes to meet your recruitment brief.

How do we connect you to top account executive talent?

Behind the scenes, our experienced consultants use a number of techniques to ensure we are only connecting you with the top candidates in any one area. We begin with quarterly seminars and regular networking to attract the right calibre of motivated and engaged job seekers, and conduct modern advertising and marketing processes to engage candidates with the expertise and experience level that you’re seeking. From here we conduct our meticulous pre-screening process including personality and behavioural profiling to identify top matches for your needs, and empower these candidates to choose opportunities that align with their personal and professional qualities. Only then do we present a tailored selection for your consideration, making the steps to hiring an effortless and precise process for your business.

Contact us for Australia-wide account executive recruitment services

Whether you’re in the business of advertising, marketing, technology or otherwise, the consultants at 4Twenty are able to help you identify the perfect account executive talent to keep your customers and clients coming back. We have candidate networks in all major cities and regions across Australia. Contact us today on email us at info@4twentyconsulting.com to provide your brief.
